name: webmasters
title: Search Console API
description: View Google Search Console data for your verified sites.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

schemas.name: UrlCrawlErrorCount
schemas.desc: An entry in a URL crawl errors time series.

fields.name: count
fields.desc: The error count at the given timestamp.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.desc: The date and time when the crawl attempt took place, in RFC 3339 format.

schemas.name: UrlCrawlErrorsCountsQueryResponse
schemas.desc: A time series of the number of URL crawl errors per error category and platform.

fields.name: countPerTypes
fields.desc: The time series of the number of URL crawl errors per error category and platform.

schemas.name: WmxSitemapContent
schemas.desc: Information about the various content types in the sitemap.

fields.name: indexed
fields.desc: The number of URLs from the sitemap that were indexed (of the content type).

fields.name: submitted
fields.desc: The number of URLs in the sitemap (of the content type).

fields.name: type
fields.desc: The specific type of content in this sitemap. For example: web.

fields.name: startDate
fields.desc: [Required] Start date of the requested date range, in YYYY-MM-DD format, in PST time (UTC - 8:00). Must be less than or equal to the end date. This value is included in the range.

fields.name: startRow
fields.desc: [Optional; Default is 0] Zero-based index of the first row in the response. Must be a non-negative number.

fields.name: aggregationType
fields.desc:
[Optional; Default is "auto"] How data is aggregated. If aggregated by property, all data for the same property is aggregated; if aggregated by page, all data is aggregated by canonical URI. If you filter or group by page, choose AUTO; otherwise you can aggregate either by property or by page, depending on how you want your data calculated; see  the help documentation to learn how data is calculated differently by site versus by page.

Note: If you group or filter by page, you cannot aggregate by property.

If you specify any value other than AUTO, the aggregation type in the result will match the requested type, or if you request an invalid type, you will get an error. The API will never change your aggregation type if the requested type is invalid.

fields.name: dimensionFilterGroups
fields.desc: [Optional] Zero or more filters to apply to the dimension grouping values; for example, 'query contains "buy"' to see only data where the query string contains the substring "buy" (not case-sensitive). You can filter by a dimension without grouping by it.

fields.name: dimensions
fields.desc: [Optional] Zero or more dimensions to group results by. Dimensions are the group-by values in the Search Analytics page. Dimensions are combined to create a unique row key for each row. Results are grouped in the order that you supply these dimensions.

fields.name: endDate
fields.desc: [Required] End date of the requested date range, in YYYY-MM-DD format, in PST (UTC - 8:00). Must be greater than or equal to the start date. This value is included in the range.

fields.name: rowLimit
fields.desc: [Optional; Default is 1000] The maximum number of rows to return. Must be a number from 1 to 5,000 (inclusive).

fields.name: searchType
fields.desc: [Optional; Default is "web"] The search type to filter for.

schemas.name: SearchAnalyticsQueryResponse
schemas.desc: A list of rows, one per result, grouped by key. Metrics in each row are aggregated for all data grouped by that key either by page or property, as specified by the aggregation type parameter.

fields.name: responseAggregationType
fields.desc: How the results were aggregated.

fields.name: rows
fields.desc: A list of rows grouped by the key values in the order given in the query.

schemas.name: UrlCrawlErrorsSample
schemas.desc: Contains information about specific crawl errors.

fields.name: first_detected
fields.desc: The time the error was first detected, in RFC 3339 format.

fields.name: last_crawled
fields.desc: The time when the URL was last crawled, in RFC 3339 format.

fields.name: pageUrl
fields.desc: The URL of an error, relative to the site.

fields.name: responseCode
fields.desc: The HTTP response code, if any.

fields.name: urlDetails
fields.desc: Additional details about the URL, set only when calling get().

fields.name: urlCrawlErrorSample
fields.desc: Information about the sample URL and its crawl error.

fields.name: sitemap
fields.desc: Contains detailed information about a specific URL submitted as a sitemap.

schemas.name: UrlCrawlErrorCountsPerType
schemas.desc: Number of errors per day for a specific error type (defined by platform and category).

fields.name: category
fields.desc: The crawl error type.

fields.name: entries
fields.desc: The error count entries time series.

fields.name: platform
fields.desc: The general type of Googlebot that made the request (see list of Googlebot user-agents for the user-agents used).

schemas.name: UrlSampleDetails
schemas.desc: Additional details about the URL, set only when calling get().

fields.name: containingSitemaps
fields.desc: List of sitemaps pointing at this URL.

fields.name: linkedFromUrls
fields.desc: A sample set of URLs linking to this URL.

schemas.name: WmxSite
schemas.desc: Contains permission level information about a Search Console site. For more information, see  Permissions in Search Console.

fields.name: permissionLevel
fields.desc: The user's permission level for the site.

fields.name: siteUrl
fields.desc: The URL of the site.

schemas.name: WmxSitemap
schemas.desc: Contains detailed information about a specific URL submitted as a sitemap.

fields.name: contents
fields.desc: The various content types in the sitemap.

fields.name: isPending
fields.desc: If true, the sitemap has not been processed.

fields.name: lastSubmitted
fields.desc: Date & time in which this sitemap was submitted. Date format is in RFC 3339 format (yyyy-mm-dd).

fields.name: type
fields.desc: The type of the sitemap. For example: rssFeed.

fields.name: warnings
fields.desc: Number of warnings for the sitemap. These are generally non-critical issues with URLs in the sitemaps.

fields.name: errors
fields.desc: Number of errors in the sitemap. These are issues with the sitemap itself that need to be fixed before it can be processed correctly.

fields.name: isSitemapsIndex
fields.desc: If true, the sitemap is a collection of sitemaps.

fields.name: lastDownloaded
fields.desc: Date & time in which this sitemap was last downloaded. Date format is in RFC 3339 format (yyyy-mm-dd).

fields.name: path
fields.desc: The url of the sitemap.

schemas.name: SitesListResponse
schemas.desc: List of sites with access level information.

fields.name: siteEntry
fields.desc: Contains permission level information about a Search Console site. For more information, see Permissions in Search Console.

methods.name: query
methods.desc: Retrieves a time series of the number of URL crawl errors per error category and platform.

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: http://www.example.com/

optinalQueryParams.name: category
optinalQueryParams.desc: The crawl error category. For example: serverError. If not specified, returns results for all categories.

optinalQueryParams.name: latestCountsOnly
optinalQueryParams.desc: If true, returns only the latest crawl error counts.

optinalQueryParams.name: platform
optinalQueryParams.desc: The user agent type (platform) that made the request. For example: web. If not specified, returns results for all platforms.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Retrieves details about crawl errors for a site's sample URL.

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: http://www.example.com/

pathParams.name: url
pathParams.desc: The relative path (without the site) of the sample URL. It must be one of the URLs returned by list(). For example, for the URL https://www.example.com/pagename on the site https://www.example.com/, the url value is pagename

requiredQueryParams.name: category
requiredQueryParams.desc: The crawl error category. For example: authPermissions

requiredQueryParams.name: platform
requiredQueryParams.desc: The user agent type (platform) that made the request. For example: web

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Lists a site's sample URLs for the specified crawl error category and platform.

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: http://www.example.com/

requiredQueryParams.name: category
requiredQueryParams.desc: The crawl error category. For example: authPermissions

requiredQueryParams.name: platform
requiredQueryParams.desc: The user agent type (platform) that made the request. For example: web

methods.name: markAsFixed
methods.desc: Marks the provided site's sample URL as fixed, and removes it from the samples list.

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: http://www.example.com/

pathParams.name: url
pathParams.desc: The relative path (without the site) of the sample URL. It must be one of the URLs returned by list(). For example, for the URL https://www.example.com/pagename on the site https://www.example.com/, the url value is pagename

requiredQueryParams.name: category
requiredQueryParams.desc: The crawl error category. For example: authPermissions

requiredQueryParams.name: platform
requiredQueryParams.desc: The user agent type (platform) that made the request. For example: web

methods.name: query
methods.desc:
Query your data with filters and parameters that you define. Returns zero or more rows grouped by the row keys that you define. You must define a date range of one or more days.

When date is one of the group by values, any days without data are omitted from the result list. If you need to know which days have data, issue a broad date range query grouped by date for any metric, and see which day rows are returned.

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: http://www.example.com/

methods.name: delete
methods.desc: Deletes a sitemap from this site.

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: http://www.example.com/

pathParams.name: feedpath
pathParams.desc: The URL of the actual sitemap. For example: http://www.example.com/sitemap.xml

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Retrieves information about a specific sitemap.

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: http://www.example.com/

pathParams.name: feedpath
pathParams.desc: The URL of the actual sitemap. For example: http://www.example.com/sitemap.xml

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Lists the sitemaps-entries submitted for this site, or included in the sitemap index file (if sitemapIndex is specified in the request).

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: http://www.example.com/

optinalQueryParams.name: sitemapIndex
optinalQueryParams.desc: A URL of a site's sitemap index. For example: http://www.example.com/sitemapindex.xml

methods.name: submit
methods.desc: Submits a sitemap for a site.

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The site's URL, including protocol. For example: http://www.example.com/

pathParams.name: feedpath
pathParams.desc: The URL of the sitemap to add. For example: http://www.example.com/sitemap.xml

methods.name: add
methods.desc: Adds a site to the set of the user's sites in Search Console.

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The URL of the site to add.

methods.name: delete
methods.desc: Removes a site from the set of the user's Search Console sites.

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The URI of the property as defined in Search Console. Examples: http://www.example.com/ or android-app://com.example/

pathParams.name: siteUrl
pathParams.desc: The URI of the property as defined in Search Console. Examples: http://www.example.com/ or android-app://com.example/

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Lists the user's Search Console sites.
